# Weather Station

This application allows you to read the data from Sub-GHz weather sensors and display it on your Flipper Zero. The interface is identical to the default Sub-GHz app, but the supported protocols are different.

## Supported Protocols

Acurite 592TXR
Acurite-606TX
Acurite-606TXC
AmbientWeather
Auriol AHFL
Avriol HG06061
GT-WT02
GT-WT03
inFactory-TH
LaCrosse_TX
Nexus-TH
Oregon-v1
Oregon2
Oregon3
ThermoPRO-TX4
TX141THBv2
TX8300
Wendox W6276
